td.content: s:a 44 yr old f presents with 7 weeks history of Liver. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in her past she denies smoking o:Height 166 cm, Weight 91.7 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, CT Abdomen shows shrunken liver, massive ascites and dilated IVC a:Cirrhosis p:administered Azathioprine - 3 mg/kg daily, performed CT Abdomen, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
